Uses of Interface
net.finmath.optimizer.StochasticOptimizer

Packages that use StochasticOptimizer
Package
Description
net.finmath.optimizer
This package provides classes with numerical algorithm for optimization of an objective function and a factory to easy construction of the optimizers.

  • Uses of StochasticOptimizer in net.finmath.optimizer

    Classes in net.finmath.optimizer that implement StochasticOptimizer
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    StochasticLevenbergMarquardt
    This class implements a stochastic Levenberg Marquardt non-linear least-squares fit algorithm.

    This class implements a stochastic Levenberg Marquardt non-linear least-squares fit algorithm.
    class

    This class implements a stochastic Levenberg Marquardt non-linear least-squares fit algorithm.
    class 
    StochasticPathwiseLevenbergMarquardtAD
    This class implements a stochastic Levenberg Marquardt non-linear least-squares fit algorithm.
